unnormalised: AIIMS Delhi is now offering OPD consultations for cancer patients every Tue. & Fri., starting 12/07/2024. This is great news, especially given the long wait times previously. Apparently, Dr. Sharma will be heading the oncology dept. This should definitely help folks from Delhi-NCR get easier access to expert opinions.
normalised: A-I-I-M-S Delhi is now offering O-P-D consultations for cancer patients every Tuesday and Friday, starting twelfth July two thousand and twenty four. This is great news, especially given the long wait times previously. Apparently, Doctor Sharma will be heading the oncology department. This should definitely help folks from Delhi hyphen N-C-R get easier access to expert opinions.

unnormalised: It's been a real struggle for many to get timely appointments. I heard stories of ppl waiting 6+ months just to see a specialist! Hopefully, this new initiative will cut down those waiting times significantly. Imagine the stress of suspecting something like leukemia or lymphoma and having to wait half a year for a diagnosis!
normalised: It's been a real struggle for many to get timely appointments. I heard stories of people waiting six plus months just to see a specialist! Hopefully, this new initiative will cut down those waiting times significantly. Imagine the stress of suspecting something like leukemia or lymphoma and having to wait half a year for a diagnosis!

unnormalised: The new OPD will cover a range of cancers, from breast cancer to lung cancer, and even rarer forms like sarcoma. They're planning on using advanced techniques like immunotherapy & targeted therapy too, which is fantastic. I also heard that the registration fee is just Rs. 50. Pretty reasonable considering the cost of cancer treatment generally.
normalised: The new O-P-D will cover a range of cancers, from breast cancer to lung cancer, and even rarer forms like sarcoma. They're planning on using advanced techniques like immunotherapy and targeted therapy too, which is fantastic. I also heard that the registration fee is just rupees fifty. Pretty reasonable considering the cost of cancer treatment generally.

unnormalised: So, if you or someone you know needs an oncology consultation, check out AIIMS Delhi's new OPD. It could be a lifesaver! Spread the word around! Every lil bit of awareness helps.
normalised: So, if you or someone you know needs an oncology consultation, check out A-I-I-M-S Delhi's new O-P-D. It could be a lifesaver! Spread the word around! Every little bit of awareness helps.
